Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/public/api/v1/inboxes/{inbox_identifier}/contacts/{contact_identifier}/conversations/{conversation_id}/messages/{message_id} \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
  "submitted_values": {
    "name": "My Name",
    "title": "My Title",
    "value": "value",
    "csat_survey_response": {
      "feedback_message": "Great service!",
      "rating": 5
    }
  }
}'
```

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#parameter-inbox-identifier)

inbox\_identifier

string

required

The identifier obtained from API inbox channel

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#parameter-contact-identifier)

contact\_identifier

string

required

The source id of contact obtained on contact create

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#parameter-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the conversation

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#parameter-message-id)

message\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the message

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#body-submitted-values)

submitted\_values

object

Replies to the Bot Message Types

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#body-submitted-values-name)

submitted\_values.name

string

The name of the submiitted value

Example:

`"My Name"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#body-submitted-values-title)

submitted\_values.title

string

The title of the submitted value

Example:

`"My Title"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#body-submitted-values-value)

submitted\_values.value

string

The value of the submitted value

Example:

`"value"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#body-submitted-values-csat-survey-response)

submitted\_values.csat\_survey\_response

object

The CSAT survey response

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#body-submitted-values-csat-survey-response-feedback-message)

submitted\_values.csat\_survey\_response.feedback\_message

string

The feedback message of the CSAT survey response

Example:

`"Great service!"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#body-submitted-values-csat-survey-response-rating)

submitted\_values.csat\_survey\_response.rating

integer

The rating of the CSAT survey response

Example:

`5`

#### Response

200401

application/json

Success

id

string

Id of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#response-content)

content

string

Text content of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#response-message-type)

message\_type

string

Denotes the message type

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#response-content-type)

content\_type

string

Content type of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#response-content-attributes)

content\_attributes

string

Additional content attributes of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#response-created-at)

created\_at

string

Created at time stamp of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#response-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

string

Conversation Id of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#response-attachments)

attachments

object\[\]

Attachments if any

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/update-a-message#response-sender)

sender

object

Details of the sender
